pages.text: Like a caveman, you've always run around manually illuminating caves, or closing their unsightly entries in your immediate vicinity. To relieve you of this work you took the self-replicating abilities of $(l:creating_life/fading)Fading$(/l) as an inspiration and developed the Block Flooder.$(br)Thrown into a narrow path, pond or ravine, those get filled - in 5% of the cases the result even looks acceptable!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Pulls matching blocks directly from your inventory to fill the gaps. If you don't have any matching ones, it will fall back to Cobblestone.
